quote.msg: 想樓主講下點樣係website度fetch d real time或者historical data 去excel 做analysis
What website for example?

Stock price (aastock, Bloomberg)
Any real time figures

replies.msg:
Allow me to type in English as I type Chinese really slow.

Getting data in website is not difficult in most cases. One issue is how to convert them into standardised format. Will skip this as it's mostly labor work. Sometime you can get the already standardised data from the API calls. Suppose you want to get the information of 0699.HK from Bloomberg (https://www.bloomberg.com/quote/669:HK), using Chrome to inspect network traffic, you can see the API url used (i.e. https://www.bloomberg.com/markets2/api/datastrip/669%3AHK%2CINDU%3AIND%2CSPX%3AIND?locale=en&customTickerList=true) and the standardised data.

The most complicated issue is throttling, that is being blocked by the website. Like LIHKG, once adopting Cloudfire, web crawling it becomes difficult. Also, this raises ethical issue as you are doing sometimes not wanted by the website.

好似好勁咁，幫P牌推兩下
利:唔識

The most complicated issue is throttling, that is being blocked by the website. Like LIHKG, once adopting Cloudfire, web crawling it becomes difficult. Also, this raises ethical issue as you are doing sometimes not wanted by the website.

Allow me to type in English as I type Chinese really slow.

Getting data in website is not difficult in most cases. One issue is how to convert them into standardised format. Will skip this as it's mostly labor work. Sometime you can get the already standardised data from the API calls. Suppose you want to get the information of 0699.HK from Bloomberg (https://www.bloomberg.com/quote/669:HK), using Chrome to inspect network traffic, you can see the API url used (i.e. https://www.bloomberg.com/markets2/api/datastrip/669%3AHK%2CINDU%3AIND%2CSPX%3AIND?locale=en&customTickerList=true) and the standardised data.

The most complicated issue is throttling, that is being blocked by the website. Like LIHKG, once adopting Cloudfire, web crawling it becomes difficult. Also, this raises ethical issue as you are doing sometimes not wanted by the website.

replies.msg:
我覺得暫時可以係好簡單嘅 subscription feed
兼容多個 platform 嘅 Feed
做咗冇爭議嘅部份先

但長遠要解決黃標問題
要脫離 YouTube 體系生存
可以掛片上 DailyMotion 再駁返落 Google Ads Network
或者 Patreon/Medium 式的 subscription model
助長黃圈

YouTube 奶共係鐵一般嘅事實
我地嘈唔掂係因為我地冇 alternative solution
YouTube: 我再奶共你都係要睇我㗎啦, 吹咩!?

外國都有 Nebula 去反 YouTube

YouTube 嘅 Database 已經有人做咗:
https://lihkg.com/thread/1893863/page/1
